data.text: a lot of trouble as a kid,

data.text: working-class background, my parents,

translation.text: tầng lớp lao động, bố mẹ tôi,

data.text: went to just a mediocre university

data.text: that I flunked out of three times before I finally graduated with honors, but...

translation.text: rằng tôi đã bỏ rơi ba lần trước khi tôi tốt nghiệp danh dự, nhưng ...

data.text: And I had no money to begin with, $820

data.text: to feeling successful.

translation.text: để cảm thấy thành công.

data.text: I was wearing suits like this, before I could afford them.

data.text: Most people procrastinate because they're unsure.

translation.text: Hầu hết mọi người chần chừ vì không chắc chắn.

data.text: So just do it.

data.text: because one of the things you learn as a young combat,
